overview: Awakening one morning to find their mother has abandoned them, two sisters set off in search of her. With only two words — "Heaven’s Eye" — as their guide, the girls find themselves in the small mountain town she left decades before: a hauntingly beautiful oasis beset by bizarre rituals, mute inhabitants, & a whispering voice which seems to come from the nearby lake.  Stalked by a sinister wraith and trapped by mysterious events leading toward some dark & unknown end, the question becomes: will the girls be reunited with their lost parent, or will they fall prey to the water's ghostly call?
title: Echoes
